span.span: Gets or sets the default UI culture for threads in the current application domain.

value.span: 在目前的應用程式定義域中為執行緒的預設 UI 文化特性，若目前的系統 UI 文化特性是應用程式定義域中的預設執行緒 UI 文化特性，則為 。

span.span: The default UI culture for threads in the current application domain, or if the current system UI culture is the default thread UI culture in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和舊版中，依預設，所有執行緒的 UI 文化特性設定為 Windows 系統的文化特性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and previous versions, by default, the UI culture of all threads is set to the Windows system culture. 對於目前 UI 文化特性不同於預設系統文化特性的應用程式，這種行為通常是讓人困擾。For applications whose current UI culture differs from the default system culture, this behavior is often undesirable. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、屬性可讓您定義應用程式定義域中的所有執行緒的預設 UI 文化特性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the property lets you define the default UI culture of all threads in an application domain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您沒有明確設定 UI 文化特性的任何現有應用程式定義域中，設定執行執行緒屬性也會變更這些執行緒的文化特性。If you have not explicitly set the UI culture of any existing threads executing in an application domain, setting the property also changes the culture of these threads. 不過，如果這些執行緒會執行另一個應用程式定義域中，則其文化特性由定義應用程式定義域中的屬性，或如果沒有預設值時，所定義的預設系統文化特性。However, if these threads execute in another application domain, their culture is defined by the property in that application domain or, if no default value is defined, by the default system culture. 因此，我們建議您一律明確地設定主應用程式執行緒的文化特性，而且請勿依賴屬性可定義主應用程式執行緒的文化特性。Because of this, we recommend that you always explicitly set the culture of your main application thread and do not rely on the property to define the culture of the main application thread. 除非已明確地設定的值屬性是`null`，和應用程式定義域中有未指派明確的文化特性的所有執行緒的目前文化特性由預設 Windows 系統的文化特性所定義。Unless it is set explicitly, the value of the property is `null`, and the current culture of all threads in an application domain that have not been assigned an explicit culture is defined by the default Windows system culture. 多個文化特性、 執行緒和應用程式定義域的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 文化特性和執行緒 」 和 「 文化特性和應用程式定義域 」 章節中參考頁面。For more information about cultures, threads, and application domains, see the "Culture and threads" and "Culture and application domains" sections in the reference page. ## Examples 下列範例將說明.NET Framework 中定義新的執行緒的目前文化特性的預設行為。The following example illustrates the default behavior of the .NET Framework in defining the current culture of a new thread. 它會使用英文和俄文語言資源。It uses English and Russian language resources. 名為 GreetingStrings.txt 下列文字檔包含英文語言資源：The following text file named GreetingStrings.txt contains the English language resources: ``` greeting =Hello again! newGreeting=Hello! ``` 它編譯成二進位.resources 檔，使用名為 GreetingStrings.resources[資源檔產生器](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)使用下列命令。It is compiled to a binary .resources file named GreetingStrings.resources by using the [Resource File Generator](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md) with the following command. ```console resgen greetingstrings.txt ``` 名為 GreetingStrings.ru RU.txt 下列文字檔包含俄文語言資源：The following text file named GreetingStrings.ru-RU.txt contains the Russian language resources: ``` greeting=Еще раз привет! newGreeting=Привет! ``` 它編譯成二進位.resources 檔，使用名為 GreetingStrings.ru RU.resources[資源檔產生器](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)使用下列命令。It is compiled to a binary .resources file named GreetingStrings.ru-RU.resources by using the [Resource File Generator](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md) with the following command. ```console resgen greetingstrings.ru-RU.txt ``` 應用程式程式碼，如下所示，位於名為 Example1.vb 或 Example1.cs 檔案中。The application code, which is shown below, resides in a file named Example1.vb or Example1.cs. 使用下列命令，如 Visual Basic 編譯器編譯的可執行檔：It is compiled to an executable by using the following command for the Visual Basic compiler: ```console vbc Example1.vb /resource:GreetingStrings.resources ``` 對於 C# 編譯器，命令會類似：For the C# compiler, the command is similar: ```console csc /resource:GreetingStrings.resources Example1.cs ``` 這會建立包含此範例可執行程式碼以及其後援文化特性資源的組件。This creates an assembly that includes the example's executable code along with the resources for its fallback culture. 您也可以使用[組件連結器](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)若要建立之俄文 （俄羅斯） 文化特性的資源檔，使用下列命令：You can also use the [Assembly Linker](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) to create the resource file for the Russian (Russia) culture with the following command: ```console >al /embed:greetingstrings.ru-RU.resources /c:ru-RU /template:example1.exe /out:ru-RU\Example1.resources.dll ``` 在啟動時，範例會設定目前文化特性與目前的 UI 文化特性為俄文 （俄羅斯） 上所有系統以外的預設系統文化特性已俄文 （俄羅斯）。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to Russian (Russia) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already Russian (Russia). 如果預設系統文化特性已俄文 （俄羅斯），程式碼會將目前的文化特性與目前 UI 文化特性至英文 （美國）。If the default system culture is already Russian (Russia), the code sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然後它會呼叫`ShowGreeting`常式，其中會顯示的後續方法呼叫的第一次呼叫的簡單字串，並稍有不同的字串。It then calls the `ShowGreeting` routine, which displays a simple string the first time it is called and a slightly different string on subsequent method calls. 接下來，它會建立新的執行緒，也會執行`ShowGreeting`常式。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `ShowGreeting` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/vb/example1.vb#1)] 範例輸出所示，當其系統的文化特性是英文 （美國） 的電腦上執行範例的主要執行緒會顯示其初始字串中俄文。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), the main thread displays its initial string in Russian. 不過，因為背景工作執行緒的文化特性衍生自目前 Windows 系統的文化特性，而不是應用程式的目前文化特性，背景工作執行緒會以英文顯示其字串。However, because the worker thread's culture is derived from the current Windows system culture rather than the application's current culture, the worker thread displays its string in English. 下列範例會使用和屬性，以定義新的應用程式執行緒的目前 UI 文化特性與目前的文化特性。The following example uses the and properties to define the current culture and current UI culture of a new application thread. 此範例與前一個範例使用相同的資源檔案。The example uses the same resources files as the previous example. 不同之處在於的可執行的組件名稱會變更，也會相同，命令進行編譯，並將當地語系化的俄文語言資源內嵌至附屬組件。The commands to compile and to embed the localized Russian language resources into a satellite assembly are also identical, except that the name of the executable assembly changes. 在啟動時，範例會設定目前文化特性與目前的 UI 文化特性為俄文 （俄羅斯） 上所有系統以外的預設系統文化特性已俄文 （俄羅斯）。At startup, the example sets the current culture and the current UI culture to Russian (Russia) on all systems except those on which the default system culture is already Russian (Russia). 如果預設系統文化特性已俄文 （俄羅斯），它會設定目前的文化特性與目前的 UI 文化特性設為英文 （美國）。If the default system culture is already Russian (Russia), it sets the current culture and the current UI culture to English (United States). 然後它會呼叫`ShowGreeting`常式，其中會顯示的後續方法呼叫的第一次呼叫的簡單字串，並稍有不同的字串。It then calls the `ShowGreeting` routine, which displays a simple string the first time it is called and a slightly different string on subsequent method calls. 接下來，它會建立新的執行緒，也會執行`ShowGreeting`常式。Next, it creates a new thread, which also executes the `ShowGreeting` routine. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/cs/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.defaultthreadcurrentuiculture/vb/example2.vb#2)] 範例輸出所示，當其系統的文化特性是英文 （美國） 的電腦上執行範例的主執行緒和背景工作執行緒其字串的俄文語言顯示。As the output from the example shows, when the example is run on a computer whose system culture is English (United States), both the main thread and the worker thread display their strings in the Russian language.

summary.span: 取得完整當地語系化文化特性名稱。

span.span: Gets the full localized culture name.

value.span: 格式完整當地語系化文化特性名稱 * languagefull * [* 國家/地區 / regionfull *]，其中 * languagefull * 是語言的完整名稱和 * 國家/地區 / regionfull * 是國家/地區的完整名稱。

span.span: The full localized culture name in the format *languagefull* [*country/regionfull*], where *languagefull* is the full name of the language and *country/regionfull* is the full name of the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示的當地語系化的名稱物件。This property represents the localized name of the object. 文化特性名稱可能會因指令碼，或格式設定慣例。Culture names may vary due to scripting or formatting conventions. 您應該使用的顯示中，傳回的名稱，並不會嘗試進行剖析。You should use the returned name for display, and not attempt to parse it. 如果自訂文化特性藉由建立類別屬性會初始化為值的屬性。If a custom culture is created by means of the class, the property is initialized to the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會顯示兩分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04 文化特性識別項，ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 文化特性。The example displays the zh-CHS and zh-CHT cultures with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得格式為 *languagefull* [*country/regionfull*] 的英文文化特性名稱。

span.span: Gets the culture name in the format *languagefull* [*country/regionfull*] in English.

value.span: 格式的文化特性名稱 * languagefull * [* 國家/地區 / regionfull *] 英文，where * languagefull * 是語言的完整名稱和 * 國家/地區 / regionfull * 是國家/地區的完整名稱。

span.span: The culture name in the format *languagefull* [*country/regionfull*] in English, where *languagefull* is the full name of the language and *country/regionfull* is the full name of the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，特定文化特性名稱 EN-US 是 「 英文 （美國） 」。For example, the for the specific culture name en-US is "English (United States)". 這個屬性的值，會是相同的.NET framework 語言版本不限。The value of this property is the same, regardless of the language version of the .NET Framework. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. summary.span: 在預設的圖形使用者介面 (Graphic User Interface，GUI) 的文化特性不適合主控台應用程式 (Console Application) 時，取得適合的替代使用者介面文化特性。

span.span: Gets an alternate user interface culture suitable for console applications when the default graphic user interface culture is unsuitable.

returns.span: 替代的文化特性，用來在主控台上讀取和顯示文字。

span.span: An alternate culture that is used to read and display text on the console.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，阿拉伯文、 希伯來文、 烏都文和敘利亞文語言取決於雙向文字。Languages such as Arabic, Hebrew, Urdu, and Syriac are based on bidirectional text. Windows 應用程式，都有圖形化使用者介面，支援雙向語言。Windows applications, which have a graphical user interface, support bidirectional languages. 不過，主控台應用程式，採用文字主控台的使用者介面的作業系統，不提供雙向的支援。However, console applications, which employ the text user interface of the operating system console, do not provide bidirectional support. 因此，如果當地語系化為阿拉伯文或希伯來文主控台應用程式時，您的應用程式會主控台畫面上顯示無法讀取的文字。Therefore, if you localize a console application to Arabic or Hebrew, your application displays unreadable text on the console screen. 使用者介面文化特性會指定應用程式需要支援使用者輸入和輸出，而且預設為作業系統的文化特性相同的資源。The user interface culture specifies the resources an application needs to support user input and output, and by default is the same as the operating system culture. 例如，屬性會傳回為阿拉伯文作業系統阿拉伯文文化特性。For example, the property returns an Arabic culture for an Arabic operating system. 使用方法來擷取適用於主控台應用程式使用者介面文化特性。Use the method to retrieve a culture suitable for a console application user interface. 您的應用程式擷取後援的使用者介面文化特性之後，它應該以目前使用者介面文化特性，則目前執行緒的指派文化特性。After your application retrieves the fallback user interface culture, it should assign the culture to the current user interface culture of the current thread. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 明確地設定目前 UI 文化特性 」 一節屬性。For more information, see the "Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture" section of the property. 下面是預先定義的文化特性，有不同的後援使用者介面文化特性名稱，從預先定義的文化特性名稱。The following are predefined cultures that have a different fallback user interface culture name from the predefined culture name. |預先定義的文化特性Predefined culture|文化特性名稱Culture name|後援使用者介面文化特性名稱Fallback user interface culture name| remarks.format: ## Remarks 我們建議您使用這個方法，字串多載 ()，因為應該使用地區設定名稱，而不是 Lcid。We recommend that you use the string overload of this method (), because locale names should be used instead of LCIDs. 自訂地區設定，地區設定名稱是必要的。For custom locales, the locale name is required. 如果`culture`是目前的文化特性，傳回的地區設定識別碼物件並不會反映任何使用者覆寫。If `culture` is the locale identifier of the current culture, the returned object does not reflect any user overrides.

span.para: [！INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]，舊版則擲回如果不是有效的文化特性識別項。從 [！INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 這個方法會擲回。從下執行的應用程式開始 [！INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 或更新版本上 Windows 7 或更新版本，方法會嘗試擷取物件識別項是從作業系統; 如果作業系統不支援該文化特性方法會擲回。

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if is not a valid culture identifier. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, the method throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需預先定義的文化特性名稱的清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，開頭為 Windows 10`name`可以是任何有效的 bcp-47 語言標記。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 方法會擷取快取、 唯讀物件。The method retrieves a cached, read-only object. 它提供更佳的效能比對的對應呼叫建構函式。It offers better performance than a corresponding call to the constructor. 如果`name`是目前文化特性的名稱，傳回物件並不會反映任何使用者覆寫。If `name` is the name of the current culture, the returned object does not reflect any user overrides. 這會讓方法適用於伺服器應用程式或工具，不會有真正的使用者帳戶的系統上，且需要有效率地載入多個文化特性。This makes the method suitable for server applications or tools that do not have a real user account on the system and that need to load multiple cultures efficiently. 如果`name`是，方法會傳回文化特性而異。If `name` is , the method returns the invariant culture. 這相當於擷取的值屬性。This is equivalent to retrieving the value of the property.

exception.span: 為 null。

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if is not a valid culture name. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需預先定義的文化特性名稱的清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，開頭為 Windows 10`name`可以是任何有效的 bcp-47 語言標記。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 方法會取得快取、 唯讀物件。The method obtains a cached, read-only object. 它提供更佳的效能比對的對應呼叫建構函式。It offers better performance than a corresponding call to a constructor. 方法用來建立類似於指定的文化特性`name`參數，但使用不同的排序和大小寫規則。The method is used to create a culture similar to that specified by the `name` parameter, but with different sorting and casing rules. 如果`name`或`altName`名稱目前文化特性中，傳回的物件不會反映任何使用者覆寫。If `name` or `altName` is the name of the current culture, the returned objects do not reflect any user overrides. 如果`name`是，方法會傳回文化特性而異。If `name` is , the method returns the invariant culture. 這相當於擷取的值屬性。This is equivalent to retrieving the value of the property. 如果`altName`是，此方法會使用的書寫系統和比較規則指定的文化特性而異。If `altName` is , the method uses the writing system and comparison rules specified by the invariant culture.

The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an if or is not a valid culture name. Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this method throws a . Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a exception. Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a object whose identifier is from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a exception.

A read-only object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法和屬性已被取代。This method and the property are deprecated. 不使用這些項目，應用程式應該使用新物件和呼叫屬性。Instead of using these elements, the application should use a new object and calls to the property. IETF 標記和名稱完全相同。IETF tags and names are identical. 會維護透過網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF) 的 RFC 4646 標準定義 IETF 語言標記，提供統一來識別語言。The RFC 4646 standard that is maintained by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) defines an IETF language tag, which provides a uniform means of identifying a language. IETF 語言標記的格式是所傳回的文化特性名稱相同屬性，但不會唯一識別文化特性。The format of an IETF language tag is the same as the culture name returned by the property, but does not identify a culture uniquely. 如果這些文化特性都有相同的語言特性不同文化特性會共用相同的 IETF 語言標記。Different cultures share the same IETF language tag if those cultures have identical linguistic characteristics. 中所包含的文化特性的語言的特性物件相關聯物件。The linguistic characteristics of a culture are contained in the object associated with a object. IETF 語言標記包含必要的語言識別碼、 選擇性的指令碼識別碼和選擇性的區域識別項。An IETF language tag consists of a mandatory language identifier, an optional script identifier, and an optional region identifier. 您的應用程式應該使用擷取的文化特性，來控制特定語言的工作，例如管理拼字或文法檢查。Your applications should use the retrieved culture to control language-specific tasks, such as managing a spelling or grammar checker. 應用程式不應該使用擷取的文化特性，來控制特定文化特性的工作，例如排序文字或格式化時間和日期。Applications should not use the retrieved culture to control culture-specific tasks, such as sorting text or formatting times and dates. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 4646、"標記的識別語言 」 和最新草稿標準、 草稿-phillips-langtags-05.txt，在[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231)。For more information, see RFC 4646, "Tags for Identifying Languages," and the most recent draft standard, Draft-phillips-langtags-05.txt, at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100231).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法最常稱為與`types`參數設定為下列值：The method is most commonly called with the `types` parameter set to the following values: - 它會傳回所有的特定文化特性。, which returns all specific cultures. - 它會傳回所有的中性文化特性和文化特性而異。, which returns all neutral cultures and the invariant culture. - 它會傳回所有的中性和特定文化特性、 安裝在 Windows 系統的文化特性和使用者所建立的自訂文化特性。, which returns all neutral and specific cultures, cultures installed in the Windows system, and custom cultures created by the user. - 它會傳回所有的自訂文化特性，例如註冊類別。, which returns all custom cultures, such as those registered by the class. Windows 10 之前的 Windows 版本中值適用於所有的使用者定義自訂文化特性。In versions of Windows before Windows 10, the value applies to all user-defined custom cultures. 從 Windows 10 開始，它會套用至系統的文化特性，缺少完整文化特性的資料，並不需要的唯一本機識別碼，由屬性值。Starting with Windows 10, it applies to system cultures that lack complete cultural data and that do not have a unique local identifier, as indicated by the property value. 如此一來，如下所示的程式碼會傳回不同的結果，當之前的 Windows 版本和 Windows 10 上執行。As a result, code such as the following will return different results when run on Windows 10 and on an earlier version of Windows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures3.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會顯示兩分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04 文化特性識別項，ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 文化特性。The example displays the zh-CHS and zh-CHT cultures with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性與方法已被取代。This property and the method are deprecated. 相反地，您應該使用屬性。Instead, you should use a the property. IETF 標記和名稱完全相同。IETF tags and names are identical. 會維護透過網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF) 的 RFC 4646 標準定義 IETF 語言標記，提供統一來識別語言。The RFC 4646 standard that is maintained by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) defines an IETF language tag, which provides a uniform means of identifying a language. IETF 語言標記的格式會類似於傳回的文化特性名稱屬性，但不會唯一識別文化特性。The format of an IETF language tag is similar to the culture name returned by the property, but does not identify a culture uniquely. 如果這些文化特性都有相同的語言特性，也就是不同文化特性共用相同的 IETF 語言標記。That is, different cultures share the same IETF language tag if those cultures have identical linguistic characteristics. 中所包含的文化特性的語言的特性物件相關聯物件。The linguistic characteristics of a culture are contained in the object associated with a object. IETF 語言標記包含必要的語言識別碼、 選擇性的指令碼識別碼和選擇性的區域識別項。An IETF language tag consists of a mandatory language identifier, an optional script identifier, and an optional region identifier. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 5646"識別語言的標記](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230876)。For more information, see [RFC 5646, "Tags for Identifying Languages](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230876). 如需子標記，請參閱[IANA 語言子標記登錄](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230877)。For a list of subtags, see [The IANA Language Subtag Registry](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=230877).

.property class System.Globalization.CultureInfo InvariantCulture
Public Shared ReadOnly Property InvariantCulture As CultureInfo

summary.span: 取得與文化特性無關的 (不變的) 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that is culture-independent (invariant).

value.span: 與文化特性無關的 (不變的) 物件。

span.span: The object that is culture-independent (invariant).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而異的文化特性是不區分文化特性。相關聯，所以與英文，但不是能搭配任何國家/地區。The invariant culture is culture-insensitive; it is associated with the English language but not with any country/region. 依名稱指定文化特性而異使用空字串 ("") 的呼叫中具現化方法。You specify the invariant culture by name by using an empty string ("") in the call to a instantiation method. 也會擷取執行個體的文化特性而異。 also retrieves an instance of the invariant culture. 幾乎所有方法中都用於需要文化特性的命名空間。It can be used in almost any method in the namespace that requires a culture. 這類屬性所傳回的物件， ，和也反映字串比較和格式設定慣例的文化特性而異。The objects returned by properties such as , , and also reflect the string comparison and formatting conventions of the invariant culture. 區分文化特性與資料不同，這是可能會變更使用者的自訂或.NET Framework 或作業系統的更新，而異的文化特性資料很穩定，經過一段時間，以及已安裝的文化特性之間，而且無法由使用者自訂。Unlike culture-sensitive data, which is subject to change by user customization or by updates to the .NET Framework or the operating system, invariant culture data is stable over time and across installed cultures and cannot be customized by users. 這可讓而異的文化特性特別適用於作業需要與文化特性無關的結果，例如格式化和剖析作業中保存格式化的資料，或排序及順序要求中，顯示資料的作業不論文化特性的固定的順序。This makes the invariant culture particularly useful for operations that require culture-independent results, such as formatting and parsing operations that persist formatted data, or sorting and ordering operations that require that data be displayed in a fixed order regardless of culture. ## 字串作業String Operations 您可以使用文化特性而異的文化特性字串作業，不會受到目前執行緒文化特性的慣例，以及屬於一致跨文化特性。You can use the invariant culture for culture-sensitive string operations that are not affected by the conventions of the current thread culture and that are consistent across cultures. 例如，您可以排序的資料，以固定的順序出現，或套用一組標準的大小寫慣例，不論目前的執行緒文化特性的字串。For example, you may want sorted data to appear in a fixed order or apply a standard set of casing conventions to strings regardless of the current thread culture. 若要這樣做，您傳遞方法，該方法的物件參數，例如和。To do this, you pass the object to a method that has a parameter, such as and . ## 保存資料Persisting Data 屬性可以用來保存資料的文化特性無關的格式。The property can be used to persist data in a culture-independent format. 這會提供已知的格式，不會變更，而且，可用來序列化和還原序列化跨文化特性的資料。This provides a known format that does not change and that can be used to serialize and deserialize data across cultures. 將資料還原序列化之後，它可以根據目前使用者的文化特性的慣例，適當地進行格式化。After the data is deserialized, it can be formatted appropriately based on the cultural conventions of the current user. 例如，如果您選擇保存字串形式的日期和時間資料，您可以傳遞物件或方法來建立字串，而且您可以傳遞物件或將字串轉換回日期和時間值的方法。For example, if you choose to persist date and time data in string form, you can pass the object to the or method to create the string, and you can pass the object to the or method to convert the string back to a date and time value. 這項技術可確保基礎的日期和時間值不會變更讀取或寫入使用者從不同的文化特性的資料時。This technique ensures that the underlying date and time values do not change when the data is read or written by users from different cultures. 下列範例會使用而異的文化特性來保存做為字串值。The following example uses the invariant culture to persist a value as a string. 然後，剖析字串，並使用法文 （法國） 和德文 （德國） 文化特性的格式化慣例來顯示其值。It then parses the string and displays its value by using the formatting conventions of the French (France) and German (Germany) cultures. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.invariantculture/cs/persist1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.invariantculture/vb/persist1.vb#1)] ## 安全性決策Security Decisions 如果您要進行安全性決策 （例如是否要允許存取系統資源） 根據字串比較或大小寫變更的結果，您不應該使用文化特性而異。If you are making a security decision (such as whether to allow access to a system resource) based on the result of a string comparison or a case change, you should not use the invariant culture. 相反地，您應該執行區分大小寫或不區分大小寫的序數比較，藉由呼叫的方法，包括參數，並提供 或做為引數。Instead, you should perform a case-sensitive or case-insensitive ordinal comparison by calling a method that includes a parameter and supplying either or as an argument. 執行區分文化特性的字串之作業的程式碼可能會造成安全性弱點，如果目前的文化特性已變更，或執行程式碼的電腦上的文化特性不同於用來測試程式碼的文化特性。Code that performs culture-sensitive string operations can cause security vulnerabilities if the current culture is changed or if the culture on the computer that is running the code differs from the culture that is used to test the code. 相反地，序數比較取決於比較字元的二進位值。In contrast, an ordinal comparison depends solely on the binary value of the compared characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中性文化特性是相關聯的文化特性的語言，但不是能搭配國家或地區。A neutral culture is a culture that is associated with a language but not with a country or region. 不同於特定的文化特性，也就是同時語言和國家 / 地區相關聯的文化特性。It differs from a specific culture, which is a culture that is associated with both a language and a country or region. 比方說，fr 是中性法文文化特性名稱，而 FR-FR 是在法國法文的文化特性的名稱。For example, fr is the name for the neutral French culture, while fr-FR is the name for the French culture in France. 如果這個屬性會傳回`false`，文化特性是特定文化特性或文化特性而異。If this property returns `false`, the culture is either a specific culture or the invariant culture. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會決定使用的中文語言的文化特性是中性文化特性。The following code example determines which cultures using the Chinese language are neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，文化特性識別項會對應至相對應的 NLS 地區設定識別項。In most cases, the culture identifier is mapped to the corresponding NLS locale identifier. 在 Windows 10，地區設定識別項之前的 Windows 版本中`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`（0x1000 或 4096） 指派給使用者所建立的自訂文化特性。In versions of Windows prior to Windows 10, the locale identifier `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` (0x1000, or 4096) is assigned to custom cultures created by the user. 從 Windows 10 開始，它會指派給任何沒有唯一的地區設定識別碼，而且沒有完整的系統提供資料的文化特性。Starting with Windows 10, it is assigned to any culture that does not have a unique locale identifier and does not have complete system-provided data. 如此一來，程式碼來逐一查看的文化特性，並擷取具有值`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`傳回較大的子集物件是否在 Windows 10 下執行。As a result, code that iterates cultures and retrieves those with an value of `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` returns a larger subset of objects if run under Windows 10. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立西班牙文 （西班牙） 與國際的排序順序，而另一個的傳統排序順序。The following code example shows how to create a for Spanish (Spain) with the international sort order and another with the traditional sort order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需預先定義的文化特性名稱和識別碼的清單，可以傳回屬性，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a list of predefined culture names and identifiers that the property can return, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，開頭為 Windows 10`name`可以是任何有效的 bcp-47 語言標記。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 請注意文化特性名稱會變動，而且它們也可以反映自訂文化特性名稱。Note that culture names are subject to change, and that they also can reflect the names of custom cultures. 屬性會遵循中提供的命名標準類別主題。The property follows the naming standards provided in the class topic. 它會傳回不包含任何指示替代排序次序的文化特性名稱的簡短形式。It returns the short form of the culture name that excludes any indication of an alternate sort order. 例如，如果您具現化物件以反映替代排序次序中，使用字串"de DE_phoneb"屬性會傳回"DE-DE"。For example, if you instantiate a object by using the string "de-DE_phoneb" to reflect an alternate sort order, the property returns "de-DE". 若要取得的文化特性的完整名稱，您應該使用， ，或屬性。To get the full name of the culture, you should use the , , or property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CPP/getcultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/CS/getcultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures/VB/getcultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## OverridesOverrides 使用者可能選擇覆寫一些與目前的文化特性的 Windows 透過 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分相關聯的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，使用者可能會選擇不同的格式顯示日期，或使用文化特性的預設值不同的貨幣。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果是`true`和指定的文化特性符合目前的文化特性的 Windows，會使用這些覆寫，包括使用者設定之屬性的所傳回的執行個體屬性，和屬性所傳回的執行個體屬性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果使用者設定都與相關聯的文化特性不相容，例如，如果選取的行事曆不是其中一個，未定義該方法的結果和屬性的值。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 值屬性和直到使用者存取該屬性不計算屬性。The values of the property and the property are not calculated until the user accesses the property. 若使用者要將目前的文化特性變更為新的文化特性，在應用程式執行，然後再存取時使用控制台中或屬性，應用程式擷取新的文化特性的預設值。If the user uses the Control Panel to change the current culture to a new culture while the application is running and then accesses the or property, the application retrieves the defaults for the new culture. 不覆寫原始的文化特性。not the overrides for the original culture. 若要保留在原始的目前文化特性的覆寫，應用程式應該存取和屬性，然後再變更目前文化特性。To preserve the overrides for the original current culture, the application should access the and properties before changing the current culture. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範 CultureInfo.Clone 也複製和與相關聯的執行個體。The following code example shows that CultureInfo.Clone also clones the and instances associated with the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 文化特性有階層，其中特定文化特性的父代是中性文化特性，是中性文化特性的父代，以及的父系為本身而異的文化特性。The cultures have a hierarchy in which the parent of a specific culture is a neutral culture, the parent of a neutral culture is the , and the parent of the is the invariant culture itself. 父文化特性包含只在其子系之間的共通資訊組。The parent culture encompasses only the set of information that is common among its children. 如果不到系統中的特定文化特性的資源，則會使用中性文化特性的資源。If the resources for the specific culture are not available in the system, the resources for the neutral culture are used. 如果無法使用中性文化特性的資源時，會使用主要組件中內嵌的資源。If the resources for the neutral culture are not available, the resources embedded in the main assembly are used. 如需有關資源後援程序的詳細資訊，請參閱[封裝和部署資源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)。For more information on the resource fallback process, see [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷每個使用的中文語言的特定文化特性的父文化特性。The following code example determines the parent culture of each specific culture using the Chinese language. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. summary.span: 取得目前 的語言的 ISO 639-2 三個字母代碼。

span.span: Gets the ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of the current .

value.span: 目前 的語言的 ISO 639-2 三個字母代碼。

span.span: The ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，英文的三個字母縮寫為"eng"。For example, the three-letter abbreviation for English is "eng". > [!NOTE] > 當處理之間的通訊，或保存的資料通常是較佳的使用完整。When communicating between processes or persisting data it is usually better to use the full . 使用剛語言可能會遺失內容和資料。Using just the language can lose context and data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回相同的值做為 Windows API 方法`GetLocaleInfo`LOCALE_SABBREVLANGNAME 值。This property returns the same value as the Windows API method `GetLocaleInfo` with the LOCALE_SABBREVLANGNAME value. 例如，英文 （美國） Windows API 中所定義的三個字母代碼是 「 繁體中文 」。For example, the three-letter code for English (United States) as defined in the Windows API is "enu". > [!NOTE] > 當處理之間的通訊，或保存的資料通常是較佳的使用完整。When communicating between processes or persisting data it is usually better to use the full . 使用剛語言可能會遺失內容和資料。Using just the language can lose context and data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中性文化特性的數個屬性。The following code example displays several properties of the neutral cultures. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例顯示舊的 zh-CHS 和 zh-CHT 文化特性名稱，其文化特性識別項分別是 0x0004 和 0x7C04。The example displays the older zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names with the 0x0004 and 0x7C04 culture identifiers, respectively. 不過，您的 Windows Vista 應用程式應該使用 zh-chs 和 Hans 名稱，而不是 ZH-CHS 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱，而不是 zh-chs 和 ZH-CHT。However, your Windows Vista applications should use the zh-Hans name instead of zh-CHS and the zh-Hant name instead of zh-CHT. Zh-chs 和 Hans 和 zh-chs 和 Hant 名稱代表目前的標準，並應使用，除非您有使用較舊名稱的原因。The zh-Hans and zh-Hant names represent the current standard, and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 它會傳回傳遞給的文化特性名稱的正規化的版本或建構函式或或方法。It returns a normalized version of the culture name that is passed to the or constructor or to the or method. 它藉由轉換中的字元正規化結果字串*languagecode2*小寫和轉換字元*country/regioncode2*為大寫，如有必要。It normalizes the result string by converting characters in *languagecode2* to lowercase and converting characters in *country/regioncode2* to uppercase if necessary. 預先定義的文化特性名稱會列在[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)Go Global 開發人員中心的頁面。Predefined culture names are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) page at the Go Global Developer Center.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，英文的兩個字母縮寫為"en"。For example, the two-letter abbreviation for English is "en". 而異的文化特性的屬性值為"iv 」。The property value for the invariant culture is "iv". > [!NOTE] > 當處理之間的通訊，或保存的資料通常是較佳的使用完整。When communicating between processes or persisting data it is usually better to use the full . 使用剛語言可能會遺失內容和資料。Using just the language can lose context and data. 如果 ISO 639-1 沒有定義特定文化特性的兩個字母的語言碼屬性會傳回三個或多個字母所組成的字串。If ISO 639-1 does not define a two-letter language code for a particular culture, the property returns a string that consists of three or more letters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱範例。For more information, see the example. ## Examples 下列範例會列出之文化特性的屬性並沒有包含兩個字母的語言碼。The following example lists the cultures whose property does not consist of a two-letter language code. span.span: if the current uses the user-selected culture settings; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可能選擇覆寫一些與目前的文化特性的 Windows 透過 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分相關聯的值。The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 例如，使用者可能會選擇不同的格式顯示日期，或使用文化特性的預設值不同的貨幣。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果是`true`和指定的文化特性符合目前的文化特性的 Windows，會使用這些覆寫，包括使用者設定之屬性的所傳回的執行個體屬性，和屬性所傳回的執行個體屬性。If is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the instance returned by the property, and the properties of the instance returned by the property. 如果使用者設定都與相關聯的文化特性不相容，例如，如果選取的行事曆不是其中一個，未定義該方法的結果和屬性的值。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined. 這個屬性時，會設定建立。This property is set when the is created.
